Body:
"""test %calls that are chained through their targets"""
t = Template(
    """
            <%def name="a()">
                this is a.
                <%call expr="b()">
                    this is a's ccall.  heres my body: ${caller.body()}
                </%call>
            </%def>
            <%def name="b()">
                this is b.  heres  my body: ${caller.body()}
                whats in the body's caller's body ?
                ${context.caller_stack[-2].body()}
            </%def>

            <%call expr="a()">
                heres the main templ call
            </%call>

"""
    )
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['this is a.',
    'this is b. heres my body:', "this is a's ccall. heres my body:",
    'heres the main templ call', "whats in the body's caller's body ?",
    'heres the main templ call']
